text: Sihamte tomaka mada arau juraa samparke prasna karae. Koraa, ‘duyotara majate ache maha papa arau manuhara babe upakarao ache; arau duyotarae papa upakaratakai bahu gune danara’. Arau sihamte tomaka sodhe, sihamte ki byaya karaiba? Koraa, ‘yito prayojanara atiraikta’. Enekai allaha ta'ala'i tomalokara babe ayatasamuha spastabharae barnana karae, yate tomaloke cinta-garaesana karaa
